casebody.data:
No. D-2613. In the Matter of Discipline of Sara Davis Harman. 565 U.S. 1053, 132 S. Ct. 811,

181 L. Ed. 2d 521,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 8335. November 28, 2011.

Sara Davis Har-man, of Glen Allen, Virginia, is suspended from the practice of law in this Court and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring her to show cause why she should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
